messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] so off topic i'm likely to get clubbed
messages.msgSnippet: ... There s some at Half.com (http://half.ebay.com/cat/buy/prod.cgi?cpid=1136176258&domain_id=1856&meta_i d=1) (For some reason it says out of stock but
messages.messageBody:
on 1/5/03 9:48 PM, Rachel Ann at hindar@... wrote:

> But does anyone on this list have a copy of Randall Kennedy's book on
> called Nigger: The Strange Career of a Troublesome Word. (sorry, I do find
> it hard to even write this, but the book sounds like a great read. I saw Mr.
> Kennedy on a book review program and he was so interesting I find myself
> really wanting to read his works) If you do, do you, are you willing to sell
> it to me? For how much? Trade? For what...

There's some at Half.com
(http://half.ebay.com/cat/buy/prod.cgi?cpid=1136176258&domain_id=1856&meta_i
d=1) (For some reason it says out of stock but there's one listed. And there
are some hardbacks. (Click on Other Editions.) I've bought a lot of things
through there (sold things too!) and have never had any problems.

Amazon sells used also. Their shipping tends to be a bit higher and it
doesn't tell you right up front the way Half.com does.

A really good site is http://www.abebooks.com/ They search a bunch of used
sites and sort them by price.

Joyce

messages.subject: so off topic i'm likely to get clubbed
messages.msgSnippet: But does anyone on this list have a copy of Randall Kennedy s book on called  Nigger: The Strange Career of a Troublesome Word. (sorry, I do find it hard to
messages.messageBody:
But does anyone on this list have a copy of Randall Kennedy's book on
called Nigger: The Strange Career of a Troublesome Word. (sorry, I do find
it hard to even write this, but the book sounds like a great read. I saw Mr.
Kennedy on a book review program and he was so interesting I find myself
really wanting to read his works) If you do, do you, are you willing to sell
it to me? For how much? Trade? For what...

Thanks...
don't club me now list moms!!!!

be well,
Rachel Ann
